modName: Argonian Followers that you can marry
summary: 3 argonian females and 2 argonian males that can follow and marry you.
descriptionHtml:
Please ENDORSE if you like the followers, Thank You.

This is my first mod ever, so any advice would be greatly appreciated. Feel free to ask questions as well.

I love Argonians and noticed the lack of followers/marriage potential with this wonderfully scaled race.  So I built these 3 female and 2 male argonians from scratch based off of my player characters.

They are located at the INN of Riverwood

Scarlett Heart-Piercer is an Archer

Sai Sharp-Edge is a 2-handed warrior

Kannott Seer-of-Beyond is a blind destruction mage with fire/frost spells and can dual cast

Robb Lar-Cenee is a Dual-wielding assassin

Iskarr Scale-Shield is a Tank with 1h mace and shield

All are essential (they can\\\'t die) and marriageable.

Recommended mods (ones i use): 

CBBEv3:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

A Beast Race Beautiful CBBE
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2995

Bigger Argonian Tails:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17339

UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037

Required mods: NONE

My inspiration to create this mod was because of another modder that had previously created argonian followers, check out his female argonian followers out.  His user is ManiacJehu and his mod can be found here: 

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=93788815

P.S. - If you wish to use this mod for tinkering feel free, all I ask is that if you end up publishing another mod, please give credit/link to my original; Thank You.
author: wowkadelin
